Issue.creator: rpjday
Issue.description: $(TOOL)"* *@GOPATH=$(abspath $(TMP_GOPATH)) go get $\{go.fqp.$\{TOOL}}* However, there is no need to set "go.fqp.dep" as that tool is processed explicitly by an earlier "gotool.dep:" rule and therefore doesn't invoke that default target, so setting "go.fqp.dep" would seem to be superfluous, no? I realize it's not doing any harm, but I see no value in hanging onto unnecessary content. Thoughts? >
